array.string: launchctl setenv ANDROID_SDK_HOME $HOME/.local/share/android launchctl setenv XDG_CONFIG_HOME $HOME/.config launchctl setenv XDG_CACHE_HOME $HOME/.cache launchctl setenv XDG_DATA_HOME $HOME/.local/share launchctl setenv XDG_STATE_HOME $HOME/.local/state launchctl setenv GNUPGHOME $HOME/.config/gnupg launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG $HOME/.config/npm/npmrc launchctl setenv TERMINFO $HOME/.local/share/terminfo launchctl setenv RANDFILE $HOME/.cache/randfile launchctl setenv ZDOTDIR $HOME/.config/zsh
